conquer.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to get control of a country by fighting
conquer.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Egypt was conquered by the Persian King Kambyses.
conquer.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The Zulus conquered all the neighbouring tribes.
conquer.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to gain control over something that is difficult, using a lot of effort
conquer.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: She was determined to conquer her fear of flying.
conquer.translation[0].definitions[3].de: to succeed in climbing to the top of a mountain when no one has ever climbed it before
conquer.translation[0].definitions[3].ex: an attempt to conquer the peaks of Everest
conquer.translation[0].definitions[4].de: to become very successful in a place
conquer.translation[0].definitions[4].ex: In the last few years, the company has succeeded in conquering the European market.
